channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Walloon Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Walloon Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Kantar for La Libre Belgique, 16–29 January 2023 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Parti Socialiste: 22.1–29.7%
  • Mouvement Réformateur: 16.5–23.4%
  • Centre démocrate humaniste: 7.1–12.2%
  • Ecolo: 8.9–14.4%
  • Parti du Travail de Belgique: 16.8–23.9%
  • DéFI: 3.7–7.7%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 21–29 November 2022 – Seat Projections for the Parties
